name: Are we there yet? (itch) (Cpt_Greeni)
description:
Are we there yet? is a fishy Singleplayer-roadtrip-family-management-endlessrunner-simulator. As a father of two children it is always hard to travel across the country. Kids are whining and begging for food, or doing some stupid stuff and you have to take care of it. In the meantime, you also have to steer your car to not crash, while your wife annoys you taking the wrong direction. Getting more and more stressed by managing your family, you have to find ways to deal with it.

By using the mouse and keyboard, the player is able to steer the car, back off his wife, or keeping the children safe.

To steer: click and hold left mouse button on the wheel and move left or right
Stop your wife: click on map
Stop children: click on speech bubble and type in the text
